all.description: Returns all object schemas that have been defined for your account.

create.description: Define a new object schema, along with custom properties and associations.

update.description: Update the details for an existing object schema.

delete.description: Deletes a schema. Any existing records of this schema must be deleted first. Otherwise this call will fail.

createAssociation.description: Defines a new association between the primary schema's object type and other object types.

deleteAssociation.description: Removes an existing association from a schema.
